short_summary: Notice has been cancelled, no procurement anticipated. No further information available.
description: This notice has been cancelled. No procurement is associated with this record.
full_summary:
================================

### Tender Notice - Cancelled

#### Reference Number
PW-22-01015960

#### Solicitation Number
PR22SLPE

#### Publication Date
2022-12-06

#### Tender Closing Date
31 March 2026 14:00 EST

#### Status
Cancelled

#### GGSIN Description
The construction tender falls under the following Special Trade Construction Work categories:

*   Construction of one and two dwelling buildings
*   Construction of multi-dwelling buildings
*   Construction of warehouses and industrial buildings
*   Construction of other buildings
*   General heavy construction
*   Other special trade construction work

#### Regions of Opportunity
The tender is open to the following regions:

*   Europe
*   Canada
*   Mexico
*   United States

#### Regions of Delivery
The regions available to deliver the contract are:

*   British Columbia

#### Contracting Entity Information
The contracting entity for this tender is **Defence Construction Canada**. Their contact address is:

*   Constitution Square, 19th Floor, 350 Albert Street
*   Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K3
*   Canada

#### Contact Information
For any queries regarding this tender notice, you may contact Mr. Mark Smith at **mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca**; or phone: 613-859-0549.

### Important Note
Due to the cancellation of this tender notice, no further action is required.
